profile_summary:
As a proficient **DevOps Engineer** with 8 years of experience, I excel in managing cloud infrastructure on **AWS** through services such as **EKS**, **RDS**, **IAM**, **VPC**, and **S3**. My technical skills include proficiency in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, as well as intermediate knowledge of **OpenTofu**, **Crossplane**, and **service mesh architectures** such as **Linkerd** and **Istio** for enhancing microservices. I have successfully implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitLab** and **Flux**, ensuring efficient and secure deployment processes.

In addition to my DevOps skills, I bring a strong foundation in full-stack development leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My experience includes building enterprise-grade applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics. I am adept at crafting monitoring solutions using tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch**, and have utilized **Sentry** for application performance management. My background encompasses developing robust applications that comply with regulations like HIPAA and PCI DSS, alongside evolving MLOps workflows to enhance machine learning model delivery.
